comments.text: Having 'Switch text direction' context menu item and it's equivalent keyboard shortcut was very useful for changing text direction for plain text areas, but not very useful for text fields with dir=auto, as it doesn't do what it supposed to do. Steps to reproduce: a. Load page with textarea long enough to show the scrollbar. [1] b. Switch text direction. Current result: ONLY the scrollbar is changing its position. textarea content isn't affected. Expected result: Well, as far as I can see there could be few solutions: a. Switch Text Direction should not affect these input fields. Maybe even remove the context menu item and the keyboard shortcut when these fields has focus! b. Fallback to plain textarea with dir=rtl/ltr. c. [1] data:text/html,%D7%91%D7%93%D7%99%D7%A7%D7%94%0a%0a%0a%0a
